Subject: Re: Same old Skulletron at heart......

Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Motormaster was clenching his jaw, he was having problems making out
what was going on. "Yes...we...must...kill.... GET OUT OF MY HEAD." he
screamed, sending a flailing backhand towards SLaughter, as he kept his
other hand tighly around his head.
